title: VR C# Developer
responsibilities: Implemented a social networking system enabling users to add friends, block others, and engage in chat conversations.

title: Unity C# Developer
responsibilities: Implemented WebSockets for continuous back-end communication.

Applied Simple Clean Architecture and Dependency Injection (DI) to achieve low coupling and high cohesion.
Facilitated communication between a WebGL app and the browser using C# and JavaScript.
Led version control efforts for organization employing Git.

title: VR Developer
